channel.title: AeroCTF on ret2school
channel.description: Recent content in AeroCTF on ret2school

item.title: [Aero CTF 2020] go away
item.description: Hello world, This writeup concerns the most difficult challenge I did on the CTF (having occupied myself a few hours to break it). At first glance, we have an “obfuscated” binary, which makes system calls to mmap and mprotect: we immediately think of a packer, and we will therefore have to unpack it. Unpacking crackme Unpacking is not a problem on Linux when you are used to malware packers on Windows, thanks to radare2 and its visual mode.
